## AI Copywriter Workflow

This workflow generates social media content using AI while maintaining brand consistency and compliance.

### Features:
- Multi-platform content generation (Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube)
- Brand voice and guideline adherence
- Character limit enforcement
- PII detection and prevention
- Content review queue for non-compliant content
- Automatic publishing queue integration

### Webhook Payload Example:
```json
{
  "topic": "10 tips for remote work productivity",
  "contentType": "post",
  "platform": "linkedin",
  "tone": "professional",
  "keywords": ["productivity", "remote work", "tips"],
  "brandGuidelines": {
    "voice": "helpful and authoritative",
    "colors": {
      "primary": "#0077B5",
      "secondary": "#00A0DC"
    }
  }
}
```
